keywords.indexterm: Quick Start Guide for Content Author

body.p: The Content Author can refer to this Quick Start Guide to get started using as quickly as possible.

ol.li: Install the Content Fusion Connector plugin.
Click the Show Content Fusion Task Manager toolbar button to display the task management view.
Create a task, add documents, and upload the task to the server.
Share the task link with Reviewers.
Once the Reviewers are finished, pull the changes and use the Merge tool to integrate the changes back into Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author.
